| HistoryText             = Five old men to whom the Mask of Death by Koala Mumba guaranteed youth to the detriment of various teenagers without their knowledge. They were forced to become members of the very successful boy-band among the teenagers of the [[Podunk Slam (Earth-616)|Podunk Slam]] by Mr. Appletree, the one who had made them rejuvenate using the mask. But when [[Marc Spector (Earth-616)|Moon Knight]] showed them what was happening to their fans, they all gave up their success and youth by destroying the mask.{{r|Marvel Fanfare Vol 1 38}}
